channel.title: Cant change item prices [help]
channel.description: hiya, i need help on my rsps. i made all the item prices and items cost 0 because its a spawn server and when i buy a item it doesnt allow me here is a picture[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/66415914/help.JPG[/img]

item.title: Cant change item prices [help]
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

model->items->itemAssistant
search for boolean playerHasItem(

and add this right after the {

If (amt==0) return true;

Read full topic

item.title: Cant change item prices [help]
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

It should be in the bin/data/cfg then just click prices.txt and find the item id, and change then just change price :).

Read full topic

item.title: Cant change item prices [help]
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“usmanm786, post:1, topic:452859”]hiya, i need help on my rsps. i made all the item prices and items cost 0 because its a spawn server and when i buy a item it doesnt allow me
here is a picture[/quote]

If you want all items to be free then find the packets for buy/bank/sell 1/5/10/all(50)/x
and remove the if for (has item (995 amount… or something likethat

Read full topic

item.title: Cant change item prices [help]
item.dc:creator: @Gravity_pk Gravity pk
item.description:
@Gravity_pk wrote:

if ur using pi go to data/cfg/prices.txt and find the item id in there, and put the price next to it, in ur case str ammy is 0 gp so its not in prices.txt, so add a line with whatever its price is, and make a space and put in the amount it costs. if ur using delta i belive its in the item.cfg line one of the 3 things before that stats are its price/alch price and i 4get last since i dont use delta. hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: Cant change item prices [help]
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

has something to do with c.hasItemAmount(995, amount)

Read full topic
